Package com

Class HRSystem

java.lang.Object
com.HRSystem
public class HRSystem extends Object
Represents a Hotel Reservation System that manages multiple hotels.

      the names of hotels in this system

    • createHotel

      public int createHotel(String name, String standard, String deluxe, String executive)
      Creates a new hotel with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new hotel
      standard - The string containing the number of standard rooms to be created along with the hotel
      deluxe - The string containing the number of deluxe rooms to be created along with the hotel
      executive - The string containing the number of executive rooms to be created along with the hotel
      Returns:
      true if the hotel is created successfully, false if the hotel already exists

    • removeHotel

      public boolean removeHotel(String name)
      Removes a hotel with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel to remove
      Returns:
      true if the hotel is removed successfully, false if the hotel does not exist

    • findHotelByName

      public Hotel findHotelByName(String name)
      Finds a hotel by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel to find
      Returns:
      the hotel with the specified name, or null if no such hotel exists

    • isAddRoomsValid

      public int isAddRoomsValid(Hotel hotel, String baseStr, String deluxeStr, String executiveStr)
      Validates the addition of rooms to the hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel to which rooms are to be added
      baseStr - the number of base rooms as a string
      deluxeStr - the number of deluxe rooms as a string
      executiveStr - the number of executive rooms as a string
      Returns:
      a result code indicating the validation status: 0 - invalid input, 1 - hotel already has 50 rooms, 2 - total rooms exceed the limit, 3 - no rooms to add, 4 - invalid room count, 5 - valid input

    • addRooms

      public void addRooms(Hotel hotel, String baseStr, String deluxeStr, String executiveStr)
      Adds rooms to the hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel to which rooms are to be added
      baseStr - the number of base rooms as a string
      deluxeStr - the number of deluxe rooms as a string
      executiveStr - the number of executive rooms as a string

    • removeRoom

      public boolean removeRoom(Hotel hotel, String room)
      Removes a room from the hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel from which the room is to be removed
      room - the name of the room to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the room was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • setBasePrice

      public boolean setBasePrice(Hotel hotel, Double price)
      Sets the base price for the hotel rooms.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel for which the base price is to be set
      price - the new base price
      Returns:
      true if the base price was successfully set, false otherwise

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(Hotel hotel, String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, Room room)
      Removes a reservation from the hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel from which the reservation is to be removed
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkIn - the check-in date
      checkOut - the check-out date
      room - the room reserved
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • modifyMultiplier

      public void modifyMultiplier(Hotel hotel, String dateStr, String priceModifierStr)
      Modifies the price multiplier for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel for which the price multiplier is to be modified
      dateStr - the date as a string
      priceModifierStr - the price multiplier as a string

    • isModifyModifierValid

      public int isModifyModifierValid(Hotel hotel, String dateStr, String priceModifierStr)
      Validates the modification of the price multiplier.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel for which the price multiplier is to be modified
      dateStr - the date as a string
      priceModifierStr - the price multiplier as a string
      Returns:
      a result code indicating the validation status: 0 - valid input, 1 - invalid date, 2 - invalid price multiplier

    • changeHotelName

      public boolean changeHotelName(Hotel hotel, String name)
      Changes the name of the hotel.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel whose name is to be changed
      name - the new name for the hotel
      Returns:
      true if the name was successfully changed, false otherwise
